summary: "Children of Men" is a 2006 action thriller by Alfonso Cuar√≥n, set in a dystopian 2027 where humans can't have kids. The UK is overwhelmed by asylum seekers and the government detains and deports them. Theo Faron (Clive Owen) helps a refugee, Kee (Clare-Hope Ashitey), escape. The film stars big names like Julianne Moore and Michael Caine. It got lots of praise for its story, looks, and unique action scenes, earning three Oscar nominations and winning several awards. It's now considered one of the best films of the 21st century.
title: Children of Men
